text: Ara yakhana tadera upare marakera abirbhaba halo tara balale -- ''he musa! Tomara prabhura kache amadera jan'ya prarthana karo yemana tini tomara kache oyada karechena, tumi yadi amadera kacha theke mahamari apasarita kare da'o tabe amara niscaya'i tomate imana anabo ara tomara sange abasya'i isara'ilabansiyadera pathiye debo.
